nodes.text: Star Wars: Smuggler's Starship Activity Book and Model

Star Wars: Smuggler's Starship Activity Book and Model is a canon children's activity set in the Star Wars Construction Books series. The set includes an activity book and miniature Millennium Falcon paper model. It was written by Craig Jelley and published by Egmont UK Ltd on June 2, 2016.

Studio Fun International published an edition for the United States on August 21, 2018, titled Star Wars: Millennium Falcon Activity Book and Model. Insight Editions is scheduled to release a second U.S. edition on October 6, 2020, titled Star Wars: Smuggler's Starship Activity Book and Model Set.

Join Han and Chewbacca aboard the fastest bucket of bolts in the galaxy. Packed with amazing puzzles and a Millennium Falcon of your own to build, there's hours of Star Wars fun to be had. Complete mazes, codewords and puzzles in the uniquely illustrated, full colour activity book. Then press out the pieces to create your very own mini Millennium Falcon model, perfect for recreating famous scenes from the Star Wars saga.
